text: Heikki Haavisto (20 August 1935 – 22 July 2022) was a Finnish politician and lobbyist. He was the Minister of Foreign Affairs in Esko Aho's cabinet between 1993 and 1995. He was a member of the Centre Party. Haavisto was born in Raisio, Finland. Haavisto died on 22 July 2022 in Raisio at the age of 86.Ex- ulko­ministeri Heikki Haavisto on kuollut ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Finnish politicians
title: Heikki Haavisto
